meanings.definition: To bring something to the attention of the general public.
meanings.sent1: The charity aimed to popularise their cause through a fundraising event.
meanings.sent2: The news anchor tried to popularise the urgent weather warning to viewers.
meanings.sent3: The magician's attempt to popularise his disappearing act left the audience in awe.

meanings.definition: To increase the popularity or acceptance of something.
meanings.sent1: The influencer's endorsement helped popularise the trendy fashion brand.
meanings.sent2: The marketing campaign aimed to popularise the healthy snack among children.
meanings.sent3: His attempt to popularise his unusual hobby of collecting socks raised some eyebrows.
